content:
Maybe interesting for the Roadmaps: https://grapesjs.com/

I think it would be a nice feature to have GrapeJS available at Backdrop :wink:
How do you see it integrated? What is it replacing or adding to?
Hmmm, interesting. Looks like its a tool for building those content editors everyone seems to be using these days. I see it being, or at least starting out as, a contributed module though.
There is a 7.x module that could be ported: https://www.drupal.org/project/grapesjs
...seems to be working from within CKEditor 4 (so requires it)
